meanings.sent1: The preannounced party was well-attended by all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The preannounced sale attracted a large crowd to the store.
meanings.sent3: The preannounced picnic turned out to be a surprise birthday celebration!
meanings.sent4: The preannounced storm arrived with a fury, catching everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The preannounced meeting was a great opportunity for networking.

meanings.sent1: The preannounced movie premiere had fans lining up for tickets.
